page.title: 14Freezers and Fridge Freezers
page.content:
In our class there are 29 children but on the day there were 26. There are {16 people who have a freezer.}Freezers are useful because you can put food in them like chips, meat, peas, ice cream and ice lollies. Sometimes people freeze carrots. There is a lot of food you can freeze in freezers. There are{24 people who have got {fridge freezers.}You can put chocolate and milk in the fridge freezer. We can keep food in tins like salmon, peas, corned beef, beans, tomatoes and carrots. We keep our breakfast cereals in cupboards like cornflakes and weetabix.
By Sonia Pollard & Victoria Woodhams
